file.name: recursive_reference_in_root.spec.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Test specification for the translating parser
  version: 0.0.0
paths:
  /hosts:
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: A local recursive reference
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RecursiveObject'
components:
  schemas:
    RecursiveObject:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/RecursiveObject"
